short_description: pitchbox print is a commercial printing company based in fullerton, california, united states.
long_description: we are known as "the artsy creative couple" and have thrived to reach our passion in arts and creativity. our dreams have come true. nadya, an alumni of california state university of fullerton in fine arts and peter from pasadena art center of design, we have been in the creative field for over 35 years combined. nadya with 15 years of graphic design & fine art experience and peter with 20 years of design, packaging, marketing collateral and art direction. after 11 years together, we are now a family of 4 with two creative artsy daughters. we continue to be as involved in the arts since college which ultimately led us to create pitchbox print. with pitchbox print, we look forward to sharing our passion for the arts and photography by printing, networking and providing the long lasting memories for people to keep. now with the ability to collaborate together, we are excited to service customers with a tangible product that will last for generations to come. -nadya & peter. with downtown los angeles sunset (remodeled stadium).

generated_description: pitchbox print is a family-owned gicl√©e online printing business that specializes in high-quality luxury canvas printing, photo printing, and specialty fine art printing for photography, fine art, and design. they offer a variety of paper options, including archival grade photo print papers that can last up to 80 years and longer. pitchbox print also provides museum and gallery grade canvas made from 100% cotton or poly-cotton blend canvas in bright white or warm-toned 100% cotton or poly cotton blend. the company is owned by nadya and peter, who are passionate about the arts and photography and aim to provide long-lasting memories for people to keep. they work with clients, photographers, and artists virtually or by phone to guide them through the many options they offer in paper and frames.
